subject: Deduplicate issue-sync-registry entries and close orphaned test issues
description:
Deduplicated issue-sync-registry (77 -> 41 entries, removed 36 null-issue duplicates). Closed orphaned test issues #41-44.

Evidence:
- `ledger/issue-sync-registry.json` - 41 entries after dedup (was 77)
- `gh issue close 41` - `Closed issue atgfw/claude-config#41 ([infra] feat: Recurring issue)`
- `gh issue close 42` - `Closed issue atgfw/claude-config#42 ([infra] feat: Status update test)`
- `gh issue close 43` - `Closed issue atgfw/claude-config#43 ([infra] feat: Pattern two)`
- `gh issue close 44` - `Closed issue atgfw/claude-config#44 ([infra] feat: Pattern one)`

Verification: All 4 issues confirmed closed via gh CLI output."
activeForm: Cleaning issue registry and closing test issues
